# executionBlocks

**Instance Property**

The blocks associated with the receiver.

## Declaration

```swift
var executionBlocks: [() -> Void] { get }
```

## Discussion

The blocks in this array are copies of those originally added using the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/BlockOperation/addExecutionBlock(_:)] method.

## Managing the Blocks in the Operation

- **init(block:)**: Creates and returns an `NSBlockOperation` object and adds the specified block to it.
- **addExecutionBlock(_:)**: Adds the specified block to the receiver’s list of blocks to perform.
